body_html:
@ebrevdo I'll schedule a design review for the design doc since there don't seem to be any large outstanding comments. @wechselstrom Note the planned design is actually an in-place change to SparseTensor,

After the change you should be able to use SparseTensors with ops that support IndexedSlices (with a little bit of rewrapping), and create SparseTensors from IndexedSlices (again with re-wrapping), paving the way for the eventual merging of the two.

Once the restrictions on the python SparseTensor wrapper have been loosened we'll gradually add support for "block-sparse" tensors to the existing sparse tensor ops.
